text: Miss Vietnam 2018 (Vietnamese: Hoa hậu Việt Nam 2018) was the 16th edition of the Miss Vietnam pageant. It was held on September 16, 2018 at Phu Tho Indoor Stadium, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. Miss Vietnam 2016 Đỗ Mỹ Linh crowned her successor Trần Tiểu Vy at the end of the event. The pageant crowned the Vietnam representatives to compete in two of the major international beauty pageants: Miss World 2018 and Miss International 2018. One minor pageant, Miss Grand International. ==Results== ===Placements=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;" ! style="background- color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"| Results !
